title: My Immortal
description: Alexia just woke up from the hospital and it's been five long weeks since she was shot with the poison arrow. With Gabriel's help she searches everywhere to find where the authorities are torturing Shadow, but 6 months later they are still no closer to finding him. When Alexia has a revelation and sets out to save Shadow alone, her luck takes a turn for the worst because Shadow is not who he once was. Now he is not only a danger to himself but also to her. He has been raped, tortured, abused, experimented on, and beaten to within an inch of his life. Alexia won't give up on Shadow, no matter what the cost. It doesn't matter to her that her friends don't accept Shadow because he is part demon and angel. He means everything to her. With determination and love, she makes it her mission to bring Shadow back from his personal hell, while a war between the Hell-Horde rages all around them. Can they overcome all of the obstacles standing between them and a happily ever after? Author's 43,000 words. Dystopian paranormal romance with HEA!
author: Anastasia Dangerfield
